description: Try our easy to follow Chicken San Choy Bau recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken San Choy Bau Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Maggi 2 Minute Noodles Chicken Wholegrain
1 head iceberg lettuce, outer leaves cut into cups

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium sized bowl, stir Infusion Paste through chicken mince. Heat oil in large frying pan, add chicken, cook for 5 minutes or until browned. Add water chestnuts, bamboo, carrot, cabbage and Maggi Teriyaki Stir Fry Finishing Sauce, cook for a further 5-6 minutes.
Meanwhile cook MAGGI 2 Minute Noodle Chicken as per packet instructions; drain and add to pan.
Stir through spring onions and coriander. Serve into prepared lettuce cups.
